title: Ginny's Sacrifice - A Time Travel Novella
description: You may have heard of people wanting to write letters or text their younger or future self, but Ginny Mathews never imagined she’d be able to travel back in time to actually visit her 18-year-old self. Now, as a 60-year-old woman, time travel has become commercialized and available to anyone who wants to change their life – for a price. Follow Ginny on her wild ride to the past as she discovers just how much she’s willing to sacrifice - to have the life she’s always dreamed of. (Ginny’s Sacrifice – A Time Travel Novella, is centered around Ginny's adventure - very light romance.)
author: Niki Alling
